replies.bodyText: Good catch; there was no machine breaking this constraint. Once I removed the filter, the fast fast worked.

timeline.bodyText:
One experiment to make this go faster (not to be done as part of this PR!),
is to something like this:
from(MrProcessAssignment) // Look mom, no resource selected!
.groupBy(MrProcessAssignment::getMachine,
    sum(MrProcessAssignment::getUsages, some lamdba's)) // MrProcessAssignment::getUsages returns an array of usages

Now that would screw up our constraint matches count, etc but the score would end up the same. Regardless if we'd want to do it, it's an interesting performance experiment.
